name: Rotom Heat
description: The Plasma Pokémon. Its body is composed of plasma. It is known to infiltrate electronic devices and wreak havoc.

abilities.name: Levitate
abilities.description: This Pokémon is immune to ground moves.

forms.description: Rotom has 5 alternate forms that it can take when it is near a household appliance. As a bonus action, Rotom can take the Heat Form, Wash Form, Frost Form, Fan Form, or Mow Form, changing its typing and stats. The form is dependent on the type of appliance it possesses (DM Discretion). separate stat blocks are provided for each form. When in an alternate form, Rotom knows and can use a specific move in addition to its other moves. Rotom Heat knows Overheat, Rotom Wash knows Hydro Pump, Rotom Frost knows Blizzard, Rotom Fan knows Air Slash, and Rotom Mow knows Leaf Storm.
